Rosenstock (1914: 56)

subSubSection.paragraph: ­­­ Distribution :— Costa Rica , Panamá , Andes from Venezuela to Bolivia .
Habitats :—Clearings and exposed habitats in uppermost montane forest, and in grass páramo, frequent in culturally influenced páramo, 2500–3474 m elev.

­­­ Specimens­­­studied:—Bocas­­­del­­­
